hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
#studyids=("hvh")
find data/ -exec rm -rf {} \; find completed/ -exec rm -rf {} \;
mkdir completed
mkdir data
# Managed Inputs aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} data/
csvcut -c 1,2,3,8,9 data/Managed_Inputs.csv > inputs.csv
IFS=',' [ ! -f inputs.csv ] while read abv_name stdy_id stdy_type data_ready data_processed do echo "$abv_name $data_ready $data_processed" find data/ -name "phs*" -exec rm -rf {} \;
find completed/ -type f -exec rm -rf {} \;
if [[ ${data_ready,,} == *"yes"* ]]; then if [[ ${abv_name,,} != *"ORCHID"* ]]; then if [[ ${data_processed,,} == *"no"* ]]; then
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${studyid,,}/data/${studyid^^}_PatientMapping.v2.csv data/
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${studyid,,}/rawData/ data/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*subject.multi*.txt" --include "*Subject.Multi*.txt" --include "*Subject.MULTI*.txt" --include "*subject.MULTI*.txt" --quiet else echo "${abv_name,,} ${stdy_id^^} already processed." fi fi else echo "$abv_name ${stdy_id^^} not ready for processing" fi
done < inputs.csv
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/data/PatientPool.txt data/
java -jar jars/HPDSPatientNumTracker.jar
#### get all subject multi files, job.config and patient mapping file from each study
ts=$(date +"%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S")
#aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/data/PatientPool.txt s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/data/PatientPool.txt${ts} #aws s3 cp completed/PatientPool.txt s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/data/PatientPool.txt
#IFS=',' #[ ! -f inputs.csv ] #while read abv_name stdy_id stdy_type data_ready data_processed #do
# aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${studyid,,}/data/${studyid^^}_PatientMapping.v2.csv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${studyid,,}/data/${studyid^^}_PatientMapping.v2.csv_${ts} # aws s3 cp data/${studyid^^}_PatientMapping.v2.csv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/${studyid,,}/data/${studyid^^}_PatientMapping.v2.csv
#done
